docTitle.titlePart: Formation of porous Ge using HF-based electrolytes

byline.docAuthor:
Giovanni Flamand
*1 , Jef Poortmans
1 , and Kristof Dessein
2

byline.affiliation: 1 Microsystems, Components and Packaging Division, IMEC vzw,

front.note: Received 29 February 2004, revised 17 August 2004, accepted 27 January 2005
front.div:
We have performed an extensive study of the porosification of germanium by anodization in HF-based
electrolytes. Both n-and p-doped Ge substrates (with varying doping levels) were used, as well as differ-
ent electrolyte concentrations, anodization currents and times. We will review the conclusions we were
able to draw from this series of experiments.
